info.title: Bluesky Social
info.description: Specification for the Bluesky Social endpoints

scopes.transition:generic: General access to user data and actions
scopes.transition:chat.bsky: Access to chat features, including direct messages

get.description: Retrieves a list of missing blobs (data units) in the repository. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository to check for missing blobs.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of missing blobs.

items.description: The unique identifier of a missing blob.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves a list of records within the repository. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository to list records from.

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: Filter by the type of records to list.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of records.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

put.description: Updates or creates a record within the repository. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

recordId.description: Unique identifier of the record to be created or updated.

200.description: Successfully put the record in the repository.

success.description: Indicates if the record was successfully created or updated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Uploads a binary blob to the specified repository in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `com.atproto.repo` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The binary file to upload as a blob.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository where the blob will be stored.

blobId.description: The unique identifier of the uploaded blob.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Activates a newly created account based on verification data, enabling access to the platform. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: activationCode
parameters.description: The activation code provided to the user during account creation.

200.description: Successfully disabled invites for the specified account.

success.description: Indicates if the account's invites were successfully disabled.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves the status of a specific account, providing details on activation and accessibility. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the account to check.

200.description: Successfully disabled invites for the specified account.

success.description: Indicates if the account's invites were successfully disabled.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Confirms a user's email address during account setup. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: confirmationCode
parameters.description: The confirmation code sent to the user's email.

success.description: Indicates if the email was successfully confirmed.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid confirmation code or parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Creates a new user account on the platform. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace.

email.description: Email address associated with the account.

accountId.description: Unique identifier of the newly created account.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Generates a new app-specific password for the user, allowing limited access to applications. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: appName
parameters.description: The name of the application for which the password is being created.

success.description: Indicates if the app password was successfully created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific moderation event in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the moderation event to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the moderation event details.

eventId.description: The unique identifier of the moderation event.

eventType.description: The type of the moderation event (e.g., 'warning', 'ban').

targetId.description: The identifier of the target associated with the event.

reason.description: The reason for the moderation event.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the event was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified event does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Creates a single invite code, allowing the invited user to create an account. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: targetEmail
parameters.description: The email address of the user to be invited.

success.description: Indicates if the invite code was successfully created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Generates new invite codes for users in the system. This endpoint is part of the `com.atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

count.description: The number of invite codes to create.

expiration.description: The expiration date of the invite codes.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Initiates a new user session, providing an authentication token. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

authToken.description: The generated authentication token for the session.

success.description: Indicates if the session was successfully created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Deactivates the user's account, suspending access to the platform. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully deactivated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

delete.description: Deletes a specified set in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.set` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: setId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the set to delete.

success.description: Indicates if the set was successfully deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified set does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

delete.description: Deletes specific values from a specified set in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.set` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: setId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the set from which to delete values.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: List of values to be deleted from the set.

200.description: Successfully deleted the specified values from the set.

success.description: Indicates if the values were successfully deleted.

message.description: Confirmation message for the deletion of values.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified set does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

delete.description: Ends the user's current session, effectively logging them out. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

success.description: Indicates if the session was successfully deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves values from a specified set in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.set` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: setId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the set from which to retrieve values.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of values to retrieve from the set.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving values, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved values from the specified set.

items.description: A value from the specified set.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified set does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of sets based on specified filters in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.set` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter to apply when querying sets, such as a keyword or tag.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of sets to retrieve in the query results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving sets, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of sets matching the query.

setId.description: The unique identifier of the set.

description.description: A brief description of the set.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the set was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

put.description: Creates or updates a set in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.set` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: setId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the set. If not provided, a new set will be created.

description.description: A brief description of the set.

values.description: A list of values to include in the set.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the set.

setId.description: The unique identifier of the upserted set.

message.description: Confirmation message for the upsert operation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves metadata and configuration details about the server. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace.

features.description: List of features supported by the server.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves a list of invite codes associated with the user's account. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the invite code was created.

expiresAt.description: Timestamp when the invite code will expire, if applicable.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves authentication information for the current service, such as token details or login requirements. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

expiresIn.description: Expiration time of the authentication token in seconds.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves details about the current session, including user information and session status. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user associated with the session.

isActive.description: Indicates if the session is currently active.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves a list of app-specific passwords generated for the user's account. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of app passwords.

appPasswordId.description: Unique identifier of the app password.

appName.description: Name of the app associated with the password.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the app password was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Refreshes the current session, extending the authentication validity period. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

authToken.description: The new authentication token for the refreshed session.

expiresIn.description: Expiration time of the authentication token in seconds.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Initiates a request to delete the user's account. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

success.description: Indicates if the account deletion request was successfully initiated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Sends a confirmation email to verify the users email address. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

success.description: Indicates if the email confirmation request was successfully sent.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Initiates a request to update the users email address. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: newEmail
parameters.description: The new email address to associate with the users account.

success.description: Indicates if the email update request was successfully initiated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Sends a password reset request to the users email, initiating the password reset process. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address associated with the users account.

success.description: Indicates if the password reset request was successfully initiated.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid email or parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Reserves a signing key for the user, enabling specific cryptographic operations. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

keyName.description: Name of the signing key to be reserved.

success.description: Indicates if the signing key was successfully reserved.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Resets the users password after verifying a reset token, enabling them to regain account access. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace.

parameters.name: resetToken
parameters.description: The token provided to verify password reset.

parameters.name: newPassword
parameters.description: The new password to set for the account.

success.description: Indicates if the password was successfully reset.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid reset token or parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

delete.description: Revokes an app-specific password, removing its access to the users account. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: appPasswordId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the app password to revoke.

success.description: Indicates if the app password was successfully revoked.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid app password ID.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Updates the users email address after verification. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.server` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: verificationToken
parameters.description: The token used to verify email update.

parameters.name: newEmail
parameters.description: The new email address to associate with the users account.

success.description: Indicates if the email address was successfully updated.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid token or parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves a binary blob from the specified repository in the Ozone system.

parameters.name: blobId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the blob to retrieve.

schema.description: The binary data of the blob.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified blob does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves binary data blocks from the repository. This endpoint is part of the `com.atproto.sync` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: blockIds
parameters.description: List of block IDs to retrieve.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves details of the latest commit made to the repository. This endpoint is part of the  `atproto.sync` namespace and requires authentication.

commitId.description: Unique identifier of the latest commit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the commit was made.

changeId.description: Identifier of the change within the commit.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieves the status of a repository, including synchronization and health information. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.sync` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository for which to retrieve the status.

repoId.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

status.description: Current status of the repository (e.g., synchronized, out-of-sync).

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified repository does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Creates a new communication template in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.communication` namespace and requires authentication.

name.description: The name of the communication template.

subject.description: The subject line of the communication template.

body.description: The body content of the communication template.

metadata.description: Optional metadata for the template, such as tags or categories.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code for the template (e.g., 'en' for English).

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the newly created template.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

409.description: Conflict - A template with the same name already exists.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

delete.description: Deletes a specified communication template from the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.communication` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the communication template to delete.

success.description: Indicates if the template was successfully deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified template does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of blobs (data units) in the repository. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.sync` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository from which to list blobs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of blobs to retrieve in the list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving blobs, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of blobs.

blobId.description: The unique identifier of the blob.

size.description: The size of the blob in bytes.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the blob was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified repository does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of repositories available for synchronization. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.sync` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of repositories to retrieve in the list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving repositories, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of repositories.

repoId.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the repository was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Notifies the system of an update to a repository, prompting synchronization. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.sync` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository that has been updated.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the latest update to the repository.

changes.description: List of changes or modifications made in the update.

200.description: Successfully notified the system of the repository update.

success.description: Indicates if the notification was successfully processed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified repository does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Requests a crawl for a specific repository, initiating a synchronization check. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.sync` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository to initiate the crawl.

200.description: Successfully initiated a crawl for the repository.

success.description: Indicates if the crawl was successfully requested.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified repository does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of communication templates in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.communication` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of templates to retrieve in the list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving templates, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of communication templates.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template.

name.description: The name of the communication template.

subject.description: The subject line of the template.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the template was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

put.description: Updates a specified communication template in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.communication` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the communication template to update.

name.description: The new name of the communication template.

subject.description: The updated subject line of the communication template.

body.description: The updated body content of the communication template.

metadata.description: Optional metadata for the template, such as tags or categories.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the updated template.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified template does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Emits a new moderation event in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

eventType.description: The type of moderation event to emit (e.g., 'warning', 'ban').

targetId.description: The identifier of the target for the moderation event.

reason.description: The reason for the moderation event.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the event was created.

eventId.description: The unique identifier of the emitted event.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a specific moderation record in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: recordId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the moderation record to retrieve.

recordId.description: The unique identifier of the moderation record.

status.description: The current status of the moderation record (e.g., 'active', 'resolved').

actions.description: List of actions taken in the moderation record.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified moderation record does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of moderation records in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter records by status (e.g., 'active', 'resolved').

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve in the list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving records, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of moderation records.

recordId.description: The unique identifier of the moderation record.

status.description: The status of the moderation record.

actions.description: List of actions taken in the moderation record.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves moderation information for a specific repository in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository to retrieve moderation information for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved moderation information for the repository.

repoId.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

moderationStatus.description: The moderation status of the repository (e.g., 'under review', 'approved').

actions.description: List of moderation actions taken on the repository.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the repository was first moderated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified repository does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of repositories with moderation information in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter repositories by moderation status (e.g., 'under review', 'approved').

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of repositories to retrieve in the list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving repositories, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of repositories with moderation information.

repoId.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

moderationStatus.description: The moderation status of the repository.

actions.description: List of moderation actions taken on the repository.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the repository was first moderated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of moderation events based on specified filters in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Filter events by type (e.g., 'warning', 'ban').

parameters.name: targetId
parameters.description: Filter events by the target identifier associated with the event.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter events by status (e.g., 'active', 'resolved').

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of events to retrieve in the list.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving events, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of moderation events.

eventId.description: The unique identifier of the moderation event.

eventType.description: The type of the moderation event.

targetId.description: The identifier of the target associated with the event.

status.description: The status of the moderation event.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the event was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves a list of moderation statuses for specified targets in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: targetIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of target identifiers to query for moderation statuses.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the moderation statuses for the specified targets.

targetId.description: The unique identifier of the target.

moderationStatus.description: The moderation status of the target (e.g., 'under review', 'approved').

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp when the moderation status was last updated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Searches for repositories based on moderation criteria in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.moderation` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query to filter repositories by moderation criteria.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter repositories by moderation status (e.g., 'under review', 'approved').

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of repositories to retrieve in the search results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving repositories, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved search results for repositories with moderation information.

repoId.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

moderationStatus.description: The moderation status of the repository.

actions.description: List of moderation actions taken on the repository.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the repository was first moderated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Retrieves the configuration settings for the Ozone server. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.server` namespace and requires authentication.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the server configuration settings.

configId.description: The unique identifier for the server configuration.

settings.description: Configuration settings and parameters for the server.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the server configuration.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Adds values to a specific set in the system, useful for managing lists or collections. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.set` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: setId
parameters.description: Identifier of the set to add values to.

200.description: Successfully added values to the set.

success.description: Indicates if the values were successfully added to the set.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid set ID or values.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Finds correlations between a specified signature and related records in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.signature` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: signatureId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the signature to find correlations for.

200.description: Successfully found correlations for the specified signature.

signatureId.description: The unique identifier of the signature.

recordId.description: The unique identifier of a correlated record.

correlationScore.description: The correlation score between the signature and the record.

correlatedRecords.description: List of records correlated with the specified signature.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified signature does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Finds accounts related to a specified signature in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.signature` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: signatureId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the signature to find related accounts for.

parameters.name: correlationThreshold
parameters.description: The minimum correlation score required to consider an account as related.

200.description: Successfully found related accounts for the specified signature.

accountId.description: The unique identifier of a related account.

correlationScore.description: The correlation score between the signature and the account.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified signature does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

get.description: Searches for accounts based on a signature pattern or criteria in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.signature` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: signaturePattern
parameters.description: The signature pattern or criteria to search for related accounts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of accounts to retrieve in the search results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving accounts, useful for pagination.

200.description: Successfully retrieved search results for accounts matching the signature criteria.

accountId.description: The unique identifier of a matching account.

signatureMatchScore.description: The match score between the account's signature and the search pattern.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Adds a new member to a team, assigning them a specified role. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.team` namespace and requires authentication.

memberId.description: Unique identifier of the member to add.

role.description: Role assigned to the member in the team.

success.description: Indicates if the member was successfully added.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

delete.description: Deletes a specified member from a team in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.team` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team from which the member will be deleted.

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the member to delete.

success.description: Indicates if the member was successfully deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified team or member does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

put.description: Updates information for a specified team member in the Ozone system. This endpoint is part of the `tools.ozone.team` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team to which the member belongs.

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the member to update.

parameters.name: memberData

role.description: The new role of the team member within the team.

status.description: The status of the team member (e.g., 'active', 'inactive').

parameters.description: Data containing the updates for the team member.

200.description: Successfully updated the team member information.

memberId.description: The unique identifier of the updated team member.

message.description: Confirmation message for the update operation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

404.description: Not Found - The specified team or member does not exist.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

post.description: Submits an operation to the Personal Log Chain (PLC) for processing. This endpoint is part of the `atproto.identity` namespace and requires authentication.

operationId.description: The unique identifier of the operation to be submitted.

content.description: The data related to the PLC operation.

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successfully submitted.

operationId.description: The unique identifier of the submitted operation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

500.description: Internal Server Error - The server encountered an unexpected condition.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the repository containing the record.

data.description: Data content of the retrieved record.

404.description: Not Found - The specified record does not exist.

repoId.description: The unique identifier of the repository.

records.description: List of records in the repository.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor whose account is being deleted.

success.description: Indicates if the account was successfully deleted.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor exporting their data.

dataUrl.description: URL to download the exported account data.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Deletes a specific message from the users view without affecting other participants' views. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the message to delete.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the actor deleting the message.

200.description: Successfully deleted the message for the actor.

success.description: Indicates if the message was successfully deleted from the actor's view.

get.description: Retrieves a conversation for specified members, based on unique identifiers for the members. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: A comma-separated list of member IDs for the conversation.

members.description: List of member IDs in the conversation.

get.description: Retrieves a conversation by its unique identifier. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation.

members.description: List of member IDs in the conversation.

get.description: Retrieves the log (message history) of a specific conversation by its unique identifier. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.name: convoId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to retrieve the log.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to retrieve in the log.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results, provided by the previous response.

get.description: Retrieves a list of messages in a specific conversation by its unique identifier. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to retrieve messages from.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for paginated results, provided by the previous response.

200.description: Successfully retrieved messages in the conversation.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next set of results, if available.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to leave a specific conversation, removing it from their active conversations. This endpoint is part of the `chat.bsky` namespace and requires authentication.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation to leave.

success.description: Indicates if the user successfully left the conversation.

success.description: Indicates if the conversation was successfully muted.

accountId.description: The unique identifier of the account to delete.
